title: 22. CW4 Bradley Palm - An elite pilot, a horrible crash, and his fight to fly again
description:
What would you do if the one thing you’ve worked harder for than anything else, was suddenly taken away from you?

CW4 Bradley Palm, a 160th SOAR pilot, woke up 15 days after his Chinook crashed during a daring night-time mission. He would awake to injuries that should have permanently ended his flight career. Even worse, he found out the crash had claimed the life of his co-pilot CW3 Jake Sims and caused injury to every member of his flight crew.

SGM Matt Parrish and CCM Greg Smith talk with CW4 Palm about what it takes to not only to become an elite Night Stalker, but how family, faith, and a ‘Don’t Quit’ mindset helped him overcome life-changing adversity.

Subscribe today and leave us a review!
